channel.title: Profit Margins on FinanClub

item.title: DIS
item.description: score:28 Chances: Disney’s stock may have the chance to see some positive movement if the activist investor’s demands for clear succession planning and studio improvements are met. The nomination of Nelson Peltz and former Disney CFO Jay Rasulo to Disney’s board could bring fresh perspective and potentially help restore ’the magic’ to the company.
